vidTitle: Game Development Vlog for Dot Evade
heading: 1/9/16 - Game Development Video Log- Dot Evade 1 - Week 1n
post: Hooray, my first game. I'll be talking about what I accomplished during my first week of development.

heading: 5/6/16 - Unity3D Tutorial: Event System - Part 3
post: I'm going to update car prototype to make use of unity event system.

heading: 4/27/16 - Unity3D Tutorial: Event System - Part 2
post: I'm going to update my configuration scene to make use of my new event system.

heading: 4/23/16 - Unity3D Tutorial: Event System - Part 1
post: I'm going to talk about my TagArcadeEventSystem to replace the Standalone Input Module.

heading: 4/16/16 - Unity3D Tutorial: Event System - Overview
post: Here's my new series on how to merge the Unity Event System to my custom In-Button Game Mapping vidCode.

heading: 2/22/16 - Tutorial: In-Game Button Configuration-Part 3
post: Part 3 of my Button Configuration tutorial series. Here I'll teach you how to detect the analog sticks on the controller.

heading: 2/15/16 - Tutorial: In-Game Button Configuration-Part 2n
post: Part 2 of my Button Configuration tutorial series. Here I'll teach you how to detect the buttons on the controller along with the keyboard keys.

heading: 2/14/16 - Tutorial: In-Game Button Configuration-Part 1n
post: Part 1 of my Button Configuration tutorial series. Here I'll modify my car prototype script (from Tip: Why I'm using C# vs JavaScript) in order to redefine the controls later on.

heading: 2/13/16 - Tutorial: In-Game Button Configuration-Intro
post: An overview of the topics that will be covered in the In-Game Button Configuration tutorial series.

vidTitle: How to Create Publish a Working Web GL Game
heading: 1/31/16 - Tutorial: How to create / publish a working WebGL game from Unity 3D
post: A video tutorial on how to create / publish a WebGL version from Unity3D

heading: 1/29/16 - Tip: Screenshots within Unity 3D for App Store Submissionsn
post: It's very time consuming to compile your app to every device just for screenshots. So here's a trick to get those screenshots all within Unity3D.

heading: 1/29/16 - Tip: How to fix unsupported devices on upcoming version via Amazon App Submission
post: This was painful. I submitted an updated app to the Google Play Store successfully, but couldn't figure out how to update it on the Amazon App Store. It kept on saying my update doesn't support any devices. After researching for two days, I had nothing and was about to give up when I stumbled upon it's secrets. Here's how to fix it for newbies like me. ARRRRRGGGGG!!!!!!!!!

heading: 1/10/16 - Tip: Unity - Why I'm using C# vs JavaScriptn
post: In this video, I'll explain one reason why I chose to use C# over JavaScript. To help illustrate this point, I'll create a car (it's really a cube) and make it move. I'll also talk about playmode tint within the Unity editor.

heading: 1/9/16 - Tip: Unity - Fix 'Application.LoadLevel(string)' is obsolete: 'Use SceneManager.LoadScene'
post: I'll discuss how to fix this warning. If you are also a beginner, I'll show you how to create two scenes and have a button load between them. Along the way, I'll purposefully introduce more errors so that you can learn what they are and how to fix them as well.n

heading: 1/30/16 - Game Development Video Log- Dot Evade - Week 4 n
post: Welcome to week 4. I updated the game's User Interface so it looks more polished. I also added additional sound effects and the player exploding. I used the WebGL build for the web version and you can now download the game for Windows and Mac.

heading: 1/22/16 - Game Development Video Log- Dot Evade - Week 2&3
post: Here's week 3. I published the game to the Amazon App Store as well as the Google Play store. I added music and 4 player co-op. Additionally, I added default joystick controls when playing the game for the first time. I also talked about why I didn't post week 2. I was too busy playing with my Intuos Art tablet by Wacom to update my game.

heading: 5/23/16 - Unity3D Tutorial: How to Implement Admob Banner Ads
post: Here's an example of how to implement the Admob banner ads into a game project.n

vidTitle: Add Admob to Unity3D for Android
heading: 5/22/16 - Unity3D Tutorial: How to add Admob to Unity3D for Android
post: Here's an updated Admob tutorial in Unity3D for Android.

heading: 6/12/16 - Unity3D Tutorial: How to Pause Your Game While Allowing Some Animations to Play
post: I'll show you two ways to pause your game. One is the easiest with Time.timescale. While the other one is using a Pause template script. With this, your background animation will still play while everything else will pause.
